column8: South}}</ref> aged 195 years) was the fourteenth [[King of Gondor]] and the third of the [[Ship-king]]s.

column1: He succeeded his father [[Eärnil I]] in {{TA
column3: n}}<ref name="South"/> and continued Eärnil's naval policies. He spent much of his life to maintain the [[Umbar
column4: Haven of Umbar]] that was captured by his father. He defended the haven against the [[Haradrim]], who were led by the [[Black Númenóreans]], whom his father had driven off Umbar.<ref>{{App

column2: 1015}} he was slain in [[Haradwaith]] while Umbar was besieged<ref>{{App
column3: TA}}</ref> and was succeeded by his son [[Ciryaher]], also known as [[Hyarmendacil I]].<ref name="South"/>
